ygData.subject: Re: New Faction
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok nothing against you and I have no enforcment in this but I think now is not the time for a new faction.  We need to concentrate characters into two or three

Ok nothing against you and I have no enforcment in this but I think 
now is not the time for a new faction.  We need to concentrate 
characters into two or three factions and make them large and have 
power in them.  We can't spread to thin.
